about_the_game:
The FINAL FANTASY XV Original Soundtrack heralds the dawn of a new age in FF music. The main composer, Yoko Shimomura, brings her signature dramatic compositions to this masterpiece.

*The tracklist differs from the Blu-ray version.

*This is an audio-only album and does not include video content.
